text: Men in Black 3 is a 2012 American 3D science fiction comedy movie. It is about stopping aliens from changing the past in 1969, so Agent J travels back in time to stop that from happening. The movie stars Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones and Josh Brolin. Movie critic Roger Ebert gave the movie 3 out of 4 stars. It is a sequel to Men in Black and Men in Black II. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:2012 action movies Category:2012 comedy movies Category:2010s science fiction movies Category:2010s American action movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:Comedy science fiction movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:Men in Black Category:American monster movies Category:Movies composed by Danny Elfman Category:Movies directed by Barry Sonnenfeld Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:American sequel movies Category:Time travel movies Category:Marvel Comics movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:2010s sequel movies Category:Buddy cop movies Category:American buddy comedy movies Category:2012 3D movies Category:2012 crime movies Category:American criminal comedy movies Category:Movies about extraterrestrial life Category:IMAX movies
title: Men in Black 3
